about_the_game:
Call of the Deep (Originally Known as "The Barren Depths") is a first person survival horror game about walking the bottom of the ocean on foot. Heavily inspired by David Szymanski's IRON LUNG, Embers Team's MURKY DIVERS, and Zeekerss' LETHAL COMPANY.

  • Full singleplayer campaign, featuring 9 unique Levels.

  • Open Levels, able to be explored in any direction.

  • Unique but familiar retro art style, mixing old and new techniques.

  • New enemies and mechanics on every level.

  • A world full of secrets to find.

  • Full voice acting.

  • Cryptic but easy to digest storyline.

  • Heavy themes of "Thalassophobia" and "Submechanophobia"

Early in the year 1985, scientists decide to plan their most expensive expedition yet into the area surrounding ███████ ███ reef. The reason for this being that recently, a new species of fish was discovered at the very edge of a steep underwater dropoff.

While this would be incredible on its own, this is even stranger since they have ignored ███████ ███ reef for years, because of its reputation. The locals call it "The Barren Waters" as no known life has ever been sighted in the waters. After conducting a S.O.N.A.R scan, the scientists concluded on 9 main areas. Labelled sites 1-9:

You play as the lucky employee who gets to traverse down there! Your goal is to reach site 9, they couldn't scan that far, so it could be anything.

Call Of The Deep features gameplay inspired by modern hits like Lethal Company and Content Warning, but for a singleplayer demographic.

Each day you're dropped in the middle of a new environment, and you must explore and gather photos and video for points. Photograph anything weird and film anything that moves. Between days you can return to the hub and "chill". Any cool things you pick up will show up in the sub between trips.

When out in the field, you'll meet a plethora of friendly fellows to keep you company! On the top site you may find some of these little guys;

Get to the bottom of this...

(Cover art by Seru.JPG!)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or Higher
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5 or above
  • Additional Notes: This game is designed for aspect ratios close to 16:9. You can probably run this, these specs are just my PC. If you can't run it feel free to refund or contact me.

short_description: A short first-person retro sci-fi horror game where you traverse to the bottom of the ocean on foot, in 1985.
